name: Lame ST-Ports
overview: Tired of games that don't use the Amiga's superior sound and graphics capabilities? Do you ever get the feeling that your Amiga has been transformed into a bit Atari ST emulator? Now is your chance to strike back. Blast as many ST's and aliens as possible. Blast your way from the 520 level up to the Mega level and beyond... good luck! Released on the coverdisk of CU Amiga May 1990. The intro music consists of a sampled part of the Queen song "Another One Bites The Dust", taken from their 1980 album "The Game".
